A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So many things I didn't like about this movie. I won't restate so many things that have already been stated over and over again. RJ and KK changed up the formula and tried to apply ( and copy ) the MCU humor formula. It's clear that a majority of people on earth do not appreciate the way the movie was made and do not agree with the way the story was told.  My half star is for the visual effects and scene settings. John Williams was awesome per usual.
